original: intros H1 H2. intros H3 H4. unfold is_gcd in H1. unfold divides in H4. destruct H1 as [H1 _]. destruct H4 as [x H4]. apply divides_trans with (z:=x*p). apply H4. apply divides_mult_compat. apply divides_mult_inv_l with (q:=q) (r:=1). apply H3. apply H1. apply mult_le_compat. apply H1. apply H2.
